overview:
Nick Huzar is CEO @ iDeal Technologies. He specifically leads corporate vision, product UI/UX, team building and financing efforts for the company. In May 2010 Deal Springer was born as a way for merchants to post offers instantly to their followers. Launching in July of 2011 iDeal Technologies will also introduce OfferUp which is empowers everyday people to securely offer up items instantly using their smartphone.

Previous to iDeal Technologies Nick cofounded Konnects raising 6M in capital and scaling to over 1M users within 18months.

Earlier in his Career Nick held positions at T-Mobile and Microsoft.
